//   ---------------------------- ----- ----

//   DNEMiscParameter             c11      1
//   DNEResolution                c12      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c13      1
//   ShadowBufferAndTexelSize     c14      1
//   ShadowOverrideFactor         c15      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture           s1       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 0.5, 1, 0, 0.0399999991
    def c2, 2954.63867, 2047.9989, 2, 0.125
    def c3, -5.55472994, -6.98316002, 0.200000003, 0
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5_pp v1
    dcl_texcoord6 v2
    dcl_texcoord7 v3.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

    dp3_pp r0.x, v2, v2
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mad_sat_pp r0.y, c11.x, v3.w, c11.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, c0.x
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v0
    mad_pp r0.xzw, v2.xyyz, r0.x, r1.xyyz
    nrm_pp r2.xyz, r0.xzww
    mov_sat_pp r3.x, v1.w
    mov r3.yw, c1.x
    texld_pp r4, r3, s0
    dp3 r0.x, v1, v1
    add r0.z, -r0.x, c1.y
    mul r5, r4.x, r0.z
    mov r6, r5
    texkill r6
    if b0
      mad r0.zw, vPos.xyxy, c12.xyxy, c12
      mul r0.zw, r0, v3.w
      mul r6, r0.w, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_6A423886_0.txt
add r11.w, v2.w, -r11.y
mad r0.z, -r11.w, r11.x, r0.z

      mad r6, c7, r0.z, r6
      mad r6, c9, v2.w, r6
      mad r6, c10, v3.w, r6
      rcp r0.z, r6.w
      mul r3.xy, r0.z, r6
      texld r7, r3, s1
      mov r4.yz, c1
      mad r8, c14.wwzw, r4.zyyz, r3.xyxy
      texld r9, r8, s1
      texld r8, r8.zwzw, s1
      mad r0.zw, r6.xyxy, r0.z, c14
      texld r10, r0.zwzw, s1
      mov r7.y, r9.x
      mov r7.z, r8.x
      mov r7.w, r10.x
      add r6, r6.z, -r7
      cmp r7, r6, c1.z, c1.y
      mul r0.zw, r3.xyxy, c14.xyxy
      frc r0.zw, r0
      cmp r3.xy, r6, -c1.z, -c1.y
      add r3.xy, r3, r7.zwzw
      mad r3.xy, r0.z, r3, r7
      lrp r1.w, r0.w, r3.y, r3.x
      mul r0.z, r1.w, c15.x
      mul_pp r4.yzw, r0.z, r4.x
    else
      mov_pp r4.yzw, r4.x
    endif
    mov r0.w, c1.w
    mad_pp r5.xyz, c5.w, r0.w, c5
    mov_sat r0.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, c1.y
    pow_sat_pp r3.z, r0.x, c13.w
    texld_pp r3, r3.zwzw, s0
    mov_sat_pp r0.x, r1.z
    mul_pp r0.z, r0.x, c0.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.w, r3.x, c0.y
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, r0.w
    mov_sat_pp r1.w, r2.z
    mul_pp r2.w, r0.w, c2.x
    mad_pp r0.w, r0.w, c2.y, c2.z
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, c2.w
    mad r1.w, r2.w, r1.w, -r2.w
    exp_pp r1.w, r1.w
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, r1.w
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.w
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    dp3_sat_pp r0.y, r1, r2
    mad_pp r0.w, r0.y, c3.x, c3.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, r0.w
    exp_pp r0.y, r0.y
    lrp_pp r1.xyz, r0.y, c1.y, r5
    mul_pp r0.xyw, r0.x, r1.xyzz
    mad_pp r0.xyz, c4, r0.z, r0.xyww
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r4.yzww, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r3.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c13
    mov_pp r0.w, c3.z
    cmp oC0, -r5.w, c1.z, r0

// approximately 86 instruction slots used (6 texture, 80 arithmetic)
